Articles.Content: My password doesen't work anymore in the forum. Is this a test against spam ? I'm no spamer. Than i was not allowed to login, after i put a email adress. I question the account safety measures here. For the mean time, i won't login in my account anymore. Than i was able to recover by email. And was is the last image i took, about ?

I've had a dozen or so emails from users who couldn't log in and didn't receive their emails. If anyone who's reading this is in the same position then please let me know by sending an email (click the "contact us" link below).
The account, beside the forum, doesen't have issues with the password ?
